tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RegulatoryElements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    element_name VARCHAR(50),
    sequence TEXT,
    functional_significance ENUM('Enhancer', 'Promoter', 'Silencer', 'Enhancer-Promoter', 'Enhancer-Silencer', 'Promoter-Silencer', 'Enhancer-Promoter-Silencer'),
    chromosome VARCHAR(10),
    start_position INT,
    end_position INT
);

CREATE TABLE RegulatoryInteractions (
  regulatory_element_id INT,
  regulatory_factor_id INT,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (regulatory_element_id) REFERENCES RegulatoryElements(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (regulatory_factor_id) REFERENCES RegulatoryFactors(id)
);
